name: Block My Way!
description:
Tired of just solving puzzles? Block your own way!
In this puzzle platformer you place blocks to collect acorns. Sounds easy enough - until you try to perfect your route to the exit. Getting one is easy. Getting two, eh, no problem. But can you get all three?

Bounce and roll your way through four unique worlds, 75+ levels, and find the most efficient way of getting each and every acorn.

Controls
Touch on android devices. Mouse and arrows (or A/D keys) for movement.
